input_args.passage: 'Mark E. Mitchell | Military Wiki - Fandom | Mark E. Mitchell was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan (2001-present), ...'
input_args.claim: 'The second source confirms this by stating that Mark E. Mitchell was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan, which includes the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi.'
